name: Aurora Veil
effect: Screen Move. User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from both Physical and Special Attacks. If the user is Paragon Rank or higher, User and Allies instead receive 2 less damage from attacks. This move will fail if not performed under either Hail Weather or Snow Weather. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: Aurora lights and ice spin around the Pokemon and its Allies, deflecting attacks.
